wiki.content:
“I was hoping to write a romantic song that someone might to play at a party, but they also might listen to in the car on the way home from school or work, while fantasizing about someone they were crushing on. The whole intention with the song was to capture the feeling BEFORE love… when you’re obsessed with every detail about someone who you may not have even spoke to.”
 
 —	 Tegan Quin on Closer

wiki.summary: “I was hoping to write a romantic song that someone might to play at a party, but they also might listen to in the car on the way home from school or work, while fantasizing about someone they were crushing on. The whole intention with the song was to capture the feeling BEFORE love… when you’re obsessed with every detail about someone who you may not have even spoke to.”  —	 Tegan Quin on Closer

tag.name: cant even express how much i love this song
